Hi,

My name is Lyndsey and I’m with Find Your Influence. We’re a cloud-based application that helps Brands manage Influencer Campaigns utilizing bloggers and strong social influencers.

We are currently working with Microsoft on their Azure product and are looking for tech and development blogs who are interested in participating in their campaign. They are promoting a new site which allows for conversations directly with Microsoft’s Azure developers. Influencers who participate will be compensated $920 for the duration of the campaign. If you’re interested, you can register your blog by going to www.findyourinfluence.com/influencers or please email me at Lyndsey@findyourinfluence.com if you have any questions about this opportunity or about our platform.

We look forward to working with you!
